ARABIC: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The magicians threw themselves down in prostration. They said, 'We have iman in the Lord of Harun and
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The magicians, (seeing the miracle), fell down in prostration, saying: "We believe in the Lord of Moses and Aaron."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Eventually the magicians were impelled to fall down prostrate and said: "We believe in the Lord of Moses and Aaron."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The magicians bowed down in prostration saying, "We believe in the Lord of Moses and Aaron".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore all the magicians were thrown down prostrate – they said, “We accept faith in the One Who is the Lord of Haroon and Moosa.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So the magicians fell down prostrate. They said: "We believe in the Lord of Harun and Musa."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the magicians were cast down making obeisance; they said: We believe in the Lord of Haroun and Musa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the sorcerers cast themselves down prostrating. 'We believe,' they said, 'in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then the wizards were (all) flung down prostrate, crying: We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The magicians then prostrated themselves. They said, "We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then the magicians were cast down prostrate; they said: we believe in the Lord of Musa and Harun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat the magicians fell down prostrating. They said, ‘We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So the magicians were thrown down to prostration: they said, "We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So the magicians fell down prostrate. They said: "We believe in the Lord of Harun (Aaron) and Musa (Moses)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thereafter the sorcerers threw themselves down, prostrating, saying: 'We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the magicians fell down prostrate. They said, “We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:70] Thereat the sorcerers cast [their heads] down prostrating, they fell down prostrating to God, exalted be He: They said, ‘We [now] believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then the wizards were (all) flung down prostrate) their prostration was so quick that one had the impression they were thrown to the ground, (crying) i.e. the magicians: (We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.
